category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_ImpactAnalysis_Display_Limit
preference.preference_description: Defines the maximum number of objects that can be displayed in the Teamcenter Rich Client "Impact Analysis" view when users perform a "Where Referenced" all level search. Increasing from the default value (500) may cause Rich Client to fail displaying due to its current memory allocation.
